wikipedia_page.main: Squadron Leader Geoffrey Berrington Warnes,  (22 October 1914 – 22 February 1944) was a British pilot who flew with No. 263 Squadron RAF during the Second World War. He was described by Group Captain Johnnie Johnson as a "gay, cheerful character" who was a "leader of men".

response: * Squadron Leader Geoffrey Warnes of No. 263 Squadron RAF
